lead_paragraph: Southampton midfielder Gaston Ramirez has joined second-tier Middlesbrough on loan for the rest of the season, the Premier League club said on their website (www.saintsfc.co.uk) on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Southampton's Ramirez Joins Boro on Loan for Rest of Season
headline.main: Southampton's Ramirez Joins Boro on Loan for Rest of Season
